if.if: and (select id from tbl_member where tbl_member.memberNo=tbl_mento.memberNo) like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
and (select name from tbl_member where tbl_member.memberNo=tbl_mento.memberNo) like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

mapper.select: select id,nickname,name,career,(select (select id from tbl_member where tbl_member.memberNo=tbl_mentee.memberNo) from tbl_mentee where tbl_mentee.menteeNo=tbl_mento.menteeNo) as menteeId, regdate, logdate, status from tbl_member, tbl_mento, tbl_mentee where tbl_mento.memberNo=tbl_member.memberNo group by tbl_member.id order by tbl_member.regdate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(mentoNo) totalCount from tbl_mento where mentoNo>0
select count(mentoNo) countWaiting from tbl_mento where status=0
